entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as watching Malfoy and seeing Hermione slide back into the dungeon.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is described as hurrying forward with a nose like a small melon.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as sliding back into the dungeon with her robes bulging.

relationships.description: Harry saw Hermione slide back into the dungeon.
